verses.text: Welcome, sweet day of rest, That saw the Lord arise! Welcome to this reviving breast, And these rejoicing eyes!
The King himself comes near, And feasts his saints to-day; Here we may sit and see him here, And love, and praise, and pray.
One day in such a place, Where thou, my God, art seen, Is sweeter than ten thousand days Of pleasurable sin.
My willing soul would stay In such a frame as this, And sit and sing herself away To everlasting bliss.
